title: What Is the Seventh House in Astrology?

steps.title: The Seventh House is the House of Partnerships.
steps.content: The Seventh House is the House of Partnerships. It represents all kinds of committed relationships, including romantic partners, business partners, and deep friendships. Rather than representing desire or fleeting romance (the Fifth House ), the Seventh House symbolizes long-term bonds like marriage and business contracts. [2] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. It encourages you to realize what you can learn about yourself and the world through forging deep bonds with other people. [3] X Research source The Seventh House also represents ruptures in these partnerships, including divorce, lawsuits, and the end of business relationships. Find where the Seventh House is located in your birth chart to get a deeper understanding of its influence in your life. To get a free birth chart reading, visit the many sites that have them available online. The Seventh House is located directly across from the First House in your birth chart.

steps.title: The Seventh House is ruled by Venus.
steps.content: The Seventh House is ruled by Venus. This planet symbolizes love, money, and beauty. Venus's influence on the Seventh House encourages you to reflect upon what you're looking for in a committed partnership. As the planet of money, Venus also encourages you to reflect upon your career allies and potential business partners. Rather than focusing on short-term pleasure and success, Venus calls you to examine what will fulfill you in the long term. [4] X Research source What personalities and types of relationships might bring you lifelong joy? Who do you trust enough to work with in a potential business venture? What qualities are you looking for in a long-term mentor?

steps.title: The Seventh House is also ruled by Libra.
steps.content: The Seventh House is also ruled by Libra. This zodiac sign is represented by a set of scales, which symbolizes balance, fairness, and equality. [5] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Libra's influence on the Seventh House encourages you to strive for respectful, mutually fulfilling partnerships. It may also inspire you to see both sides of a conflict, which can help you find solutions and bring harmony to your relationships. [6] X Research source Libra is a cardinal sign, which makes those with Libra in their chart strong leaders. Its influence on the Seventh House encourages you to know your worth and choose partners that will make you truly happy. Libra is also an air sign. These signs are talented with communication and possess a deep intellectual side. Libra's rule over the Seventh House inspires you to practice open and honest communication in your relationships.

steps.title: Aries in the Seventh House:
steps.content: Aries in the Seventh House: You are a true individual (Aries rules the House of the Self, after all), and you bring that bold independence to each of your partnerships. Those with Aries in the Seventh House might need a little more space in their romantic partnerships, and you'll thrive with a partner that understands that. In all of your partnerships (business, romantic, and platonic), challenge yourself to open up and be a little more generous with your time and help. [7] X Research source If you're in a romantic relationship, for example, practice listening to your partner and asking what's on their mind.

steps.title: Taurus in the Seventh House:
steps.content: Taurus in the Seventh House: As an earth sign, a down-to-earth, stable relationship suits you. You'll thrive in a relationship defined by comfort and commitment, and you bring an element of calm to each of your partnerships. Just make sure you keep an open mind to avoid getting too set in your ways. Even the most stable relationships are a little unpredictable. Let your partner grow and change, and push yourself to compromise sometimes.

steps.title: Gemini in the Seventh House:
steps.content: Gemini in the Seventh House: Your communicative nature makes you strong in business and in dating. If Gemini is in the Seventh House, you'll thrive with a partner that enjoys talking as much as you do. [8] X Research source You love to talk about philosophy, art, and politics, but remember to stay grounded by talking through your emotions as well. The Seventh House encourages you to be a little more vulnerable in your partnerships. If you've had a hard day, for example, open up to your partner about it. Your bond will deepen if you let them see this side of you.

steps.title: Cancer in the Seventh House:
steps.content: Cancer in the Seventh House: You have a sensitive and open heart, which makes you very generous in your friendships and relationships. You'll benefit from partnerships with people that understand your giving nature and don't take advantage of it. Seek out people that reciprocate your generosity, and don't force yourself to commit until you're ready. Remember that it's okay to take your time before you trust and open up to people. Let yourself get to know new friends and partners at a natural pace so that you feel comfortable and satisfied in your partnerships.

steps.title: Leo in the Seventh House:
steps.content: Leo in the Seventh House: You bring joy and kindness to each of your partnerships, and you'll be happiest with partners who give that back in return. As confident as you are on the outside, you might struggle with self-doubt within your relationships. Try to believe in yourself and quiet those fears so that they don't affect your partnerships. Remember all of the qualities that make you an amazing partner and friend. If you ever start to question why your partner chose you, for example, remind yourself of that list.

steps.title: Virgo in the Seventh House:
steps.content: Virgo in the Seventh House: You are always striving to be a better version of yourself, and you bring that dedication to self-improvement to all of your relationships. As a partner, you are helpful and encouraging. Avoid taking this to the extreme by accepting that we all have strengths and weaknesses. Your partner will never be perfect, and that's a good thing! [9] X Research source Give yourself (and the people in your life) a break every now and then. Let the house be a little messy and allow your partner some space to improve themselves in their own time.

steps.title: Libra in the Seventh House:
steps.content: Libra in the Seventh House: Your sign rules the Seventh House, so you're well-suited for partnerships of all kinds. [10] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. You are especially skilled in empathizing with others and seeing other people's points of view. Just make sure you stand your ground and stick up for yourself if conflict ever arises. It's okay to set boundaries and disagree; in fact, it's healthy. [11] X Research source If your friend has been flaking on you a lot lately, advocate for your needs. Respectfully let them know that you'd like to get more advance notice if they can't make it next time (even if you understand that they've got a busy schedule).

steps.title: Scorpio in the Seventh House:
steps.content: Scorpio in the Seventh House: Your sign is known for being a little elusive and mysterious, but you actually carry a wealth of emotions within you. In relationships, you need to trust someone 100% before you can show that side of yourself. To achieve true intimacy, cultivate self-love and seek out people who treat you with kindness and respect. To learn how to trust others, trust yourself first. Follow your intuition and own your emotions. If you meet someone that treats you well, know that you deserve to be happy and try to open up to them.

steps.title: Sagittarius in the Seventh House:
steps.content: Sagittarius in the Seventh House: You crave freedom and wanderlust, even in your partnerships. This might make you more well-suited for long-distance relationships, or simply partners that give you plenty of room to be yourself and explore. You'll do best with a partner that doesn't take your need for space personally, but remember to be attentive to their needs, too. Try to strike a balance between your need for adventure and your desire for close relationships. Take your partner along on a trip instead of traveling solo and send postcards to your friends while you're away pursuing your dreams.

steps.title: Capricorn in the Seventh House:
steps.content: Capricorn in the Seventh House: In relationships, your sign is down-to-earth and stable. You crave order and consistency in your partnerships, and you feel most at home with people who understand that. As much as you may like comfort, push yourself to take a risk every now and then. For a relationship to be most fulfilling, you have to put yourself out there a little bit. If you've been hurt in the past, remember that not everyone will treat you the same way. Keep putting yourself out there and resist closing yourself off to new connections.

steps.title: Aquarius in the Seventh House:
steps.content: Aquarius in the Seventh House: As an air sign, Aquarius is a particularly intellectual and creative partner. You possess brilliant new ideas and an unwavering desire to bring positive change to the world. Just remember to get in touch with your emotions, too, and let the people close to you know how you're feeling. The Seventh House's influence encourages you to be a little more vulnerable in your partnerships. Challenge yourself to express your feelings openly with your friends and partners, even if it feels a little uncomfortable.

steps.title: Pisces in the Seventh House:
steps.content: Pisces in the Seventh House: As a sensitive and caring individual, you are almost always open to love. You shower your partners with affection and thrive in relationships. The Seventh House calls you to show yourself this same amount of love. Pay attention to your own interests and needs, and try not to lose yourself in your partnerships. Take some me-time every now and then to focus on yourself. Go to a movie alone or visit a coffee shop to read a few chapters of your favorite book. You'll return to your friends and partners feeling refreshed and whole.
